headline: Lancaster County fire company holds Dave McCormick campaign rally
author: Amber Gerard

With the Pennsylvania primary just over a month away, many of the candidates running for senate are out in state communities campaigning their case.
WGAL reporter Amber Gerard was there and has the details of the event.
Candidate Dave McCormick was in Lancaster County on Tuesday evening.
